content.raw:
I've been observing about a 20-25% failure rate in the ContactSensor.StackTestODE test in my overnight `gz_build_test` cron job. Here's a sample of the failure message:
~~~
91: [ RUN      ] ContactSensor.StackTestODE
91: 
91: Msg Waiting for masterMsg Connected to gazebo master @ http://127.0.0.1:11345
91: Msg Publicized address: 192.168.1.183
91: Dbg ServerFixture load in 0.02 seconds, timeout after 60 seconds
91: /tmp/gazebo_build/source/test/regression/contact_sensor.cc:246: Failure
91: Expected: (fabs(actualTorque.x)) < (odeTorqueTol), actual: 3.82056 vs 2
91: /tmp/gazebo_build/source/test/regression/contact_sensor.cc:247: Failure
91: Expected: (fabs(actualTorque.y)) < (odeTorqueTol), actual: 3.82071 vs 2
91: [  FAILED  ] ContactSensor.StackTestODE (2110 ms)
~~~
